actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for annual cost-of-living adjustments in the reduced SSI payments which are made to individuals in certain medical institutions.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to provide for annual cost of living adjustments in the benefits paid to individuals in certain medical institutions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to provide for annual cost-of-living adjustments in the reduced SSI payments which are made to individuals in certain medical institutions.
